synopsis.p: OANDA's offices are at 370 King Street West, Toronto, ON At the Hyatt Regency Hotel, take the west office elevators by the security desk to the second floor.

description.p: Matt will be talking about modules he's contributed to CPAN and what problems they solved. This is also a chance to wish Matt bon voyage as he departs for NYC at the end of the month.
Dave will give a little rundown on CPANday, which was August 16th. What was it? Why did it happen? What happened?
